## Connect.getJSONSchema() method

Retrieves the JSON schema for the specified resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getJSONSchema(resourceName: string): Promise<SchemaResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resourceName | string | The name of the resource to retrieve the schema for. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SchemaResponse](./foundation-comms.schemaresponse.md)&gt;
